001package ca.gc.cra.radar.application.pipeline;
002
003import ca.gc.cra.radar.adapter.kafka.HttpKafkaPosterPipeline;
004import ca.gc.cra.radar.adapter.kafka.KafkaPosterOutputAdapter;
005import ca.gc.cra.radar.adapter.kafka.Tn3270KafkaPosterPipeline;
006import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.poster.PosterOutputPort;
007import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.poster.PosterPipeline;
008import ca.gc.cra.radar.config.IoMode;
009import ca.gc.cra.radar.config.PosterConfig;
010import ca.gc.cra.radar.config.PosterConfig.DecodeMode;
011import ca.gc.cra.radar.config.PosterConfig.ProtocolConfig;
012import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.protocol.ProtocolId;
013import ca.gc.cra.radar.infrastructure.poster.FilePosterOutputAdapter;
014import ca.gc.cra.radar.infrastructure.poster.HttpPosterPipeline;
015import ca.gc.cra.radar.infrastructure.poster.Tn3270PosterPipeline;
016import java.util.ArrayList;
017import java.util.EnumMap;
018import java.util.List;
019import java.util.Map;
020import java.util.Objects;
021import java.util.Optional;
022import java.util.concurrent.Callable;
023import java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException;
024import java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService;
025import java.util.concurrent.Executors;
026import java.util.concurrent.Future;
027
028/**
029 * Coordinates protocol-specific poster pipelines that render reconstructed traffic for reporting.
030 * <p>Each configured protocol runs in its own task; not thread-safe for concurrent {@link #run(PosterConfig)}
031 * invocations.</p>
032 *
033 * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
034 */
035public final class PosterUseCase {
036  private final Map<ProtocolId, PosterPipeline> pipelines;
037
038  /**
039   * Creates a poster use case with the default protocol pipelines (HTTP, TN3270).
040   *
041   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
042   */
043  public PosterUseCase() {
044    this(defaultPipelines());
045  }
046
047  /**
048   * Creates a poster use case with custom protocol pipeline implementations.
049   *
050   * @param pipelines mapping from protocol ids to executable poster pipelines
051   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
052   */
053  public PosterUseCase(Map<ProtocolId, PosterPipeline> pipelines) {
054    Objects.requireNonNull(pipelines, "pipelines");
055    this.pipelines = Map.copyOf(pipelines);
056  }
057
058  /**
059   * Runs the configured poster pipelines based on CLI configuration.
060   *
061   * @param config poster configuration describing protocol inputs and outputs
062   * @throws Exception if a pipeline fails or required configuration is missing
063   * @implNote Launches worker threads when multiple protocols are enabled simultaneously.
064   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
065   */
066  public void run(PosterConfig config) throws Exception {
067    Objects.requireNonNull(config, "config");
068    List<Callable<Void>> tasks = new ArrayList<>();
069
070    addTask(tasks, ProtocolId.HTTP, config.http(), config);
071    addTask(tasks, ProtocolId.TN3270, config.tn3270(), config);
072
073    if (tasks.isEmpty()) {
074      throw new IllegalArgumentException("poster: no protocol inputs configured");
075    }
076
077    if (tasks.size() == 1) {
078      tasks.get(0).call();
079      return;
080    }
081
082    ExecutorService executor = Executors.newFixedThreadPool(tasks.size());
083    try {
084      List<Future<Void>> futures = executor.invokeAll(tasks);
085      for (Future<Void> future : futures) {
086        try {
087          future.get();
088        } catch (ExecutionException ex) {
089          Throwable cause = ex.getCause();
090          if (cause instanceof Exception exception) {
091            throw exception;
092          }
093          throw new RuntimeException(cause);
094        }
095      }
096    } finally {
097      executor.shutdown();
098    }
099  }
100
101  private void addTask(
102      List<Callable<Void>> tasks,
103      ProtocolId protocol,
104      Optional<ProtocolConfig> maybeConfig,
105      PosterConfig rootConfig) {
106    maybeConfig.ifPresent(cfg -> {
107      PosterPipeline pipeline = selectPipeline(protocol, cfg, rootConfig);
108      PosterOutputPort outputPort = selectOutputPort(protocol, cfg, rootConfig);
109      DecodeMode decodeMode = rootConfig.decodeMode();
110      tasks.add(() -> {
111        try {
112          pipeline.process(cfg, decodeMode, outputPort);
113        } finally {
114          outputPort.close();
115        }
116        return null;
117      });
118    });
119  }
120
121  private PosterPipeline selectPipeline(
122      ProtocolId protocol,
123      ProtocolConfig config,
124      PosterConfig rootConfig) {
125    boolean kafkaInput = config.kafkaInputTopic().isPresent();
126    if (!kafkaInput) {
127      PosterPipeline pipeline = pipelines.get(protocol);
128      if (pipeline == null) {
129        throw new IllegalStateException("No poster pipeline registered for " + protocol);
130      }
131      return pipeline;
132    }
133
134    String bootstrap = rootConfig.kafkaBootstrap()
135        .orElseThrow(() -> new IllegalArgumentException("kafkaBootstrap required for Kafka poster input"));
136    return switch (protocol) {
137      case HTTP -> new HttpKafkaPosterPipeline(bootstrap);
138      case TN3270 -> new Tn3270KafkaPosterPipeline(bootstrap);
139      default -> throw new IllegalArgumentException("Unsupported protocol: " + protocol);
140    };
141  }
142
143  private PosterOutputPort selectOutputPort(
144      ProtocolId protocol,
145      ProtocolConfig config,
146      PosterConfig rootConfig) {
147    IoMode mode = rootConfig.posterOutMode();
148    boolean kafkaInput = config.kafkaInputTopic().isPresent();
149
150    if (!kafkaInput) {
151      if (mode == IoMode.KAFKA) {
152        throw new IllegalArgumentException("posterOutMode=KAFKA requires Kafka input for " + protocol);
153      }
154      return new FilePosterOutputAdapter(
155          config.outputDirectory().orElseThrow(() ->
156              new IllegalArgumentException(protocol + " output directory required")),
157          protocol);
158    }
159
160    if (mode == IoMode.KAFKA) {
161      String bootstrap = rootConfig.kafkaBootstrap()
162          .orElseThrow(() -> new IllegalArgumentException("kafkaBootstrap required for Kafka poster output"));
163      String topic = config.kafkaOutputTopic()
164          .orElseThrow(() -> new IllegalArgumentException("Kafka report topic required for " + protocol));
165      return new KafkaPosterOutputAdapter(bootstrap, topic);
166    }
167
168    return new FilePosterOutputAdapter(
169        config.outputDirectory().orElseThrow(() ->
170            new IllegalArgumentException(protocol + " output directory required")),
171        protocol);
172  }
173
174  private static Map<ProtocolId, PosterPipeline> defaultPipelines() {
175    Map<ProtocolId, PosterPipeline> map = new EnumMap<>(ProtocolId.class);
176    map.put(ProtocolId.HTTP, new HttpPosterPipeline());
177    map.put(ProtocolId.TN3270, new Tn3270PosterPipeline());
178    return map;
179  }
180}
